channel.title: Source Film maker?
channel.description: Does anybody know where I could possibly it? I would be forever in your debt. :smiley:

item.title: Source Film maker?
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Yeah, its not publicly released, although it was in the TF2 beta for a short while, but you can’t really get that any more.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Film maker?
item.dc:creator: Sitten_duck
item.description:
I believe Valve said that it would be released when they had made a “meet the team” video for each of the classes. I believe there are only two classes waiting for a video release.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Film maker?
item.dc:creator: novalord2
item.description:
It’s seen pretty widespread use on youtube, and its not gonna be released any time soon.

But thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Film maker?
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Someone can correct me if I’m wrong, but I believe Source Film Maker is internal Valve software and has not been released to the public yet. Some people managed to get it from the TF2 beta files, so that’s about all I can say. If you do happen to find a copy, just know that downloading and using it is of questionable legality. If I were you, I’d just wait for an official Valve release.

Read full topic
